pr_title: Allow SuperAdmin to update/delete/add read only config such as action…

timeline.message:
Allow SuperAdmin to update/delete/add read only config such as action_groups, roles, roles_mapping, internal_users

timeline.bodyText: Just want to check if this is verified. Are internal users used store in any different format in 6.x.x ?
